name: ORS Alpha list with Activities for SOCU
description:
Report displays all Prisoners in an establishment along with their Personal details, Activity location, and Main Legal Status
PDD0234- v1.0 Last Modified: 28/09/2023

dataset.name: Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IDENTIFIERS AT_OFFENDER_PNC WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER_TYPE (+) = 'PNC') AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME_2, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, BIRTH_DATE, IDENTIFIER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Current Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE, V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_START_DATE, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_CATEGORY FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_OFFENDER_PRG_PRF_PAY_BANDS AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID = AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.OFF_PRGREF_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.START_DATE AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE <= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE OR AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE IS NULL)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, PAY_BAND_CODE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_START_DATE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, PROGRAM_CATEGORY, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS V_CELL, FIRST_NAME AS V_FIRST_NAME, PRISONERS.LAST_NAME AS V_SURNAME, IDENTIFIER AS V_PNCID, BIRTH_DATE AS V_DOB, MIDDLE_NAME AS V_MIDDLE_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME_2 AS V_MIDDLE_NAME2, DESCRIPTION AS V_ESTABLISHMENT, CASE WHEN V_NO_ALERT IS NULL THEN 'Y' END AS V_ALERT_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alerts AA - LZ
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFF_ALERTS, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'AA' AND 'LZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)') OR 'All' IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)') OR (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IS NULL AND 'All' IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)'))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CODE, ALERT_TYPE, OFF_ALERTS, ALERT_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alerts MA - ZZ
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFF_ALERTS, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'MA' AND 'ZZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)') OR 'All' IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)') OR (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION IS NULL AND 'All' IN ('ACCT Closed (HMPS)', 'ACCT Open (HMPS)', 'ACCT Post Closure (HMPS)'))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CODE, ALERT_TYPE, OFF_ALERTS, ALERT_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
